gw.api.exposure

Class DesktopExposureFilterSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.filters.FilterSetBase
      • gw.api.exposure.ExposureFilterSetBase
        • gw.api.exposure.OwnedRelatedExposureFilterSetBase
          • gw.api.exposure.DesktopExposureFilterSet

  • public class DesktopExposureFilterSet
extends OwnedRelatedExposureFilterSetBase
    This is the filter set for the desktop exposures page.

      Creates a DesktopExposureFilterSet for the current user.

      Gets the "related" filter which filters the Exposures to those related to the filterset's user.
